title: Need help to not tilt vs Shaco top. Any Advice?
body:
i usually can keep calm. i don't even tilt when i play morde vs quinn/vayne top... 
but if someone gets on my nerves, that's shaco. 
Can you tell how to not have a Mental Breakdown everytime i have to play vs shaco top?

ps. rito plz, he was less toxic as an ad jungler, plz revert him for god's sake.

replies.body: Drop a control ward that tils me as a shaco player cause it disables my boxes and its 75 thats nothing.

Actual laning shaco? O_o...

Outrange him, keep an eye on where the bastardboxes are, and never, ever get near brush.
Any champion with an ability that can mess with his stealth or ult by marking, tethering or DoTing him has an advantage. Also keep in mind that the shaco autoattacking you is usually the clone, while the one that walks around like an idiot is the real one.

He has awful waveclear unless he builds full AD, abuse him by slamming him into his turret repeatedly. Also prevents box spam.
If he vanishes, just run away until you can see him. Ward brush in lane.

*when he last picks and you have a low mobility melee (forgot to mention that)

what about that?
